english.segment1: I can't explain. Can't quite put my finger on it. The difference that makes us so different. We've said everything. Our words only betrayed us. Nothing is left nothing was left unsaid
english.segment2: This time I have nothing left to lose. I'm stuck the second hand won't move. Its about time that I speak my mind. Its about time, about time to find pieces of me I have lost. Without any choice I move on. Hey time you're no friend of mine. Hey time you're no friend of mine
english.segment3: You cover yourself you cover your skin. You cover yourself like you cover your sin. Please untie my hands. I'm a sinner, I'm a man. I ask for one minute to make you understand
english.segment4: This time I have nothing left to lose. I'm stuck the second hand won't move. Its about time that I speak my mind. Its about time, about to find pieces of me I have lost. Without any choice I move on. Hey time you're no friend of mine. Hey time you're no friend of mine
english.segment5: Will you be there. To catch when I stumble when I fall. When I fall
english.segment6: Its so very clear. You left me when I had no one at all. No one at all
english.segment7: Who will be there. To catch me, to catch me when I stumble. When I fall, when I fall. Its so very clear. You left me with no one at all. No one at all
english.segment8: This time I have nothing left to lose. I'm stuck the second hand won't move. Its about time that I speak my mind. Its about time, about time to find pieces of me I have lost. Without any choice I move on. Hey time you're no friend of mine. Hey time you're no friend of mine
english.segment9: No friend of mine. Time, you're no friend of mine. No friend of mine. Hey time you're no friend of mine. Hey time you're no friend of mine
english.segment10: The pieces of me I have lost. Without any choice I move on
english.segment11: Time. Time you're no friend of mine
